title: 7.5.4 Implement ComplianceService
body:
## Parent Issue
#33 - 7.5 Compliance Framework Mapping

## Objective
Implement compliance query service.

## Methods
- get_frameworks() - List all frameworks
- get_framework_details(id) - Get with domains/controls
- get_compliance_status(tenant_id, framework) - Calculate compliance %
- get_findings_by_framework(tenant_id, framework)

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/services/compliance.py`

## Estimated Time: 3 hours
